text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Walking through the academy halls<n>one lunchtime, I happen
to spot a<n>familiar face on the other side of a<n>classroom
window.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The seven of hearts should be over<n>here on the right...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, hello Trainer. I'm playing pairs.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've nearly flipped all the cards, and<n>with this I should...
Huh?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Aw, I've forgotten where everything<n>is now...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
No, you don't have to apologize. I<n>just need to concentrate
harder.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In silence, Suzuka lays the cards face<n>down once again.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right. This time for sure.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Y-yes, that's right. It's pretty<n>fun, you know, solo
pairs.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've imposed a limit on the number of<n>mistakes I can make,
so it's still<n>challenging.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And she certainly possesses the<n>mentality to strictly adhere
to that limit.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Since I'm here now, however, I<n>propose a two-player game.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You want... to play? Um, well...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry. You took me a bit by<n>surprise...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... okay. Let's give it a shot. May<n>the sharpest thinker
win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We begin our game of double pairs.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Aw, that wasn't it. Okay, your turn.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There are only a few cards left on the<n>desk. I hit a lucky
streak, snatching up<n>pairs one after another.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Those too? No! I had my eyes<n>on them!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite Suzuka's protests, I continue<n>to flip over pair after
pair.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Aw, you keep taking the cards that<n>I'm after...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
My favorite part is when I can flip<n>over a bunch of cards at
the end of a<n>game without anyone getting in the<n>way...
choice_data_list: Is that why you were playing by yourself?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Yes.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but please don't worry about that.<n>I agreed to your
invitation to play<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It appears I was a bit of a distraction<n>after all.
choice_data_list: (I think it's best I bow out now.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, is something wrong? I'm<n>going to lay the cards out
again.
choice_data_list: Huh? You want to keep going?
Huh? You want to keep going?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, and I won't let you distract me<n>this time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We continue playing until Silence<n>Suzuka has a good
number of wins to<n>her name.
